Flow.description: Modified as part of BIZ-46894.Updated the flow with the modified version Updated: RR/17/11: Updated Pricing and proposal status decisions and formula Updated RR:11/21: Updated formula field for approval check Updated RR: update Not required only when new quote is created. Updating the description Updated RR: Trigger email alert BIZ-52845: AB : Added Async path RR: added logic to updated order id

formulas.description: To populated the value of billing frequency when Billing frequency approval level is highest
formulas.name: Approverbillingfrequency

formulas.description: To populated the value of Additional free month when Additional free month approval level is highest
formulas.name: Approverfreemonth
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Record.Highest_Approver_level__c} = {!$Record.Free_month_approver_Level__c}),"Additional Free months at no cost , ","")

formulas.description: when minimum year is max level
formulas.name: Approverminimumyear
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Record.Highest_Approver_level__c} = {!$Record.Minimum_year_approver_level__c}),"Min year on year committed spend , ","")

formulas.description: when payments term value has highest approver
formulas.name: ApproverPaymentterm

formulas.description: when initial term discount value has highest approval level
formulas.name: HighestapprovernameInitialtermdiscount

formulas.description: To check is the quote new.
formulas.name: Isnew

formulas.description: Formula field to update the status value
formulas.name: Pricingproposalfieldupdateformula

formulas.description: Formula field to calculate the highest level of approver based on the value of Implementation Discount field value 0 - No Approver 1 - Sales Segment 2. - Industry sales Lead 3 - CRO 5 - SVP, Services
formulas.name: Service_ImplementationDiscountLevel

formulas.description: formula to calculate service only level on the basis of Discount percentage value
formulas.name: serviceonlyformulalevel

Flow.label: Quote After Insert-Update

textTemplates.name: Approvaltemplatepricing
textTemplates.text: Hello {!$Record.SubmittedUser__r.FirstName}, Pricing Proposal for OSA {!$Record.OSA_Number__c} has been Approved. Please access the record to view the details. Note: Please do not reply to this email as it is not monitored, and your message will not be received.

textTemplates.name: ApproveTemplateOSA
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.SubmittedUser__r.FirstName}, OSA for {!$Record.OSA_Number__c} has been Approved. Please access the record to view the details.
Note: Please do not reply to this email as it is not monitored, and your message will not be received.
